snippet: GREEN--Hadassa Miriam, nee Lewit, age 77, of Great Neck, NY, passed on Monday, May 16, 2016 at home. Beloved mother of Adina and Liora, grandmother to Rachel. Service Friday, May 20, 10am at Riverside-Nassau North Chapel, 55 North Station Plaza, Great Neck, NY. 1/3
lead_paragraph: GREEN--Hadassa Miriam, nee Lewit, age 77, of Great Neck, NY, passed on Monday, May 16, 2016 at home. Beloved mother of Adina and Liora, grandmother to Rachel. Service Friday, May 20, 10am at Riverside-Nassau North Chapel, 55 North Station Plaza, Great Neck, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GREEN, HADASSA MIRIAM
